last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 9
last_episode_to_air.overview: K takes the Guzmán family offshore in the boat and stuns them with revelations. Alejandro has a disturbing phone conversation with his mother.

name: Fugitiva
overview: A woman organizes an escape plan camouflaged as a kidnapping to protect her children from her husband's enemies.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Magda, her three children and an aide are kidnapped in their hometown of Mexico City while her husband, in Madrid for business, gets menacing messages.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: After arriving in Benidorm, Magda tells her kids the truth about their dad. Alejandro's mother hires a private investigator. Rubén grows wary of Simón.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Magda confronts Simón and is later recognized. In Mexico, the PI follows a hunch and questions witnesses. Tobías surveils Alejandro's hotel in Madrid.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: To get cash and legal papers, Magda holds Tobías captive. Nora visits a lawyer. Alejandro televises a plea, prompting Claudia to contact him.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Esperanza suggests to Alejandro that Isabel is Velasco's mole. Magda begs Tobías to help her, and later has an eye-opening experience at a nightclub.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The PI tracks down Magda. Pau's budding romance complicates her family's departure from Benidorm. Hotel security footage lands Alejandro in hot water.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Per the PI's new strategy, Magda confronts Alejandro with a list of demands. Pau sneaks back to Benidorm to see Rayco and overhears a shocking argument.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: After a warning from Tobías, Magda loses trust in K, who finally unveils the rest of his plan. A prostitute sees two very different sides of Alejandro.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: K takes the Guzmán family offshore in the boat and stuns them with revelations. Alejandro has a disturbing phone conversation with his mother.
